title: Android 13 Beta 1: The media player notification now has squiggles
content:
Google radically redesigned Android’s visual language with Android 12, and it seems the company is set to refine that look in Android 13. As a part of the first beta to Android 13, Google has updated the media player notification with a new squiggle look for the track scrubber.

more…

The post Android 13 Beta 1: The media player notification now has squiggles appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Android 13 Beta 1 has once again updated the design of the media player, now showing squiggles in that notifications area.
